DeleteLexicon.description: Deletes a specified pronunciation lexicon stored in an AWS Region.
DeleteLexicon.title: To delete a lexicon

DescribeVoices.description: Returns the list of voices that are available for use when requesting speech synthesis. Displayed languages are those within the specified language code. If no language code is specified, voices for all available languages are displayed.
DescribeVoices.title: To describe available voices

Lexicon.Content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<lexicon version="1.0" 
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/01/pronunciation-lexicon"
      xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
      xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.w3.org/2005/01/pronunciation-lexicon 
        http://www.w3.org/TR/2007/CR-pronunciation-lexicon-20071212/pls.xsd"
      alphabet="ipa" 
      xml:lang="en-US">
  <lexeme>
    <grapheme>W3C</grapheme>
    <alias>World Wide Web Consortium</alias>
  </lexeme>
</lexicon>
Lexicon.Name: example

GetLexicon.description: Returns the content of the specified pronunciation lexicon stored in an AWS Region.
GetLexicon.title: To retrieve a lexicon

ListLexicons.description: Returns a list of pronunciation lexicons stored in an AWS Region.
ListLexicons.title: To list all lexicons in a region

PutLexicon.description: Stores a pronunciation lexicon in an AWS Region.
PutLexicon.title: To save a lexicon

input.Text: All Gaul is divided into three parts

SynthesizeSpeech.description: Synthesizes plain text or SSML into a file of human-like speech.
SynthesizeSpeech.title: To synthesize speech
